languages.text: "Могу только согласиться с тобой, старик. Сколько бы грехов не нажила эта станция, превращение ее в могильник лучше не сделало!"
"You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"
languages.original_text: "Могу только согласиться с тобой, старик. Сколько бы грехов не нажила эта станция, превращение ее в могильник лучше не сделало!"

traits.locale_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many sins this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many sins this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many sins this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我完全没有异议，老家伙。就算这座星站犯下了再多的罪行，把它变成万人坑恐怕并不会让它变得更好！”
languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

traits.locale_text: “我完全没有异议，老家伙。就算这座星站犯下了再多的罪行，把它变成一大块墓地也不会让它变得更好！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « C'est pas moi qui vais vous contredire, vieillard. Même si cette station baignait dans le crime jusqu'au cou, je doute que la transformer en cimetière arrange quoi que ce soit ! »
languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est pas moi qui vais vous contredire, vieillard. Même si cette station baignait dans le vice jusqu'au cou, je doute que la transformer en cimetière arrange quoi que ce soit ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No seré yo quien se lo discuta, anciano. No sé cuántos crímenes se han cometido en esta estación, ¡pero convertirla en cementerio no mejora las cosas!».
languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

traits.locale_text: «No seré yo quien se lo discuta, anciano. No sé cuántos pecados se han cometido en esta estación, ¡pero convertirla en cementerio no mejora las cosas!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「反論する気はないけどね、おじいさん。このステーションがいくつの犯罪を重ねようと、埋葬場所にしてしまうなんて、良いはずがないでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

traits.locale_text: 「反論する気はないけどね、おじいさん。このステーションがいくつの罪を重ねようと、埋葬場所にしてしまうなんて、良いはずがないでしょう！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr werdet von mir keinen Widerspruch hören, alter Mann. Ganz gleich, wie viele Verbrechen diese Station begangen hat, sie zu einem Friedhof zu machen, hat nichts verbessert!"
languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet von mir keinen Widerspruch hören, alter Mann. Ganz gleich, wie viele Sünden diese Station begangen hat, sie zu einem Friedhof zu machen, hat nichts verbessert!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many sins this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

languages.text: "Katılıyorum ihtiyar. Bu istasyonda ne kadar suç işlenmiş olursa olsun mezarlığa çevirmenin faydası yok!"
languages.original_text: "You won't hear any disagreement from me, old man. No matter how many crimes this station has racked up, turning it into a burial ground hasn't made it any better!"

traits.locale_text: "Katılıyorum ihtiyar. Bu istasyonda ne kadar suç işlenmiş olursa olsun, mezarlığa çevirmenin de bir faydası yok!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
